column4: hello, i just finished mounting an external hard drive that ¨couldnt be mounted¨ (because of windows, but it really wasnt on windows) and now i got this message: The folder contents could not be displayed. You do not have the permissions necessary to view the contents of "sdb1".
try putting sudo before what you are trying to do. You need to be root.
or you can use chmod somehow to change the permissions on what you are trying to view
